actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a study regarding the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area in Connecticut, and for other purposes.
short_title: Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act

summary.text: Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act - Instructs the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a study on the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area in Connecticut. Requires submission of the study's results to Congress.

titles.title: Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a study regarding the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area in Connecticut, and for other purposes.
Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act
